architectureStyle.description: Technological nightmare - geometric, dark, organic-tech hybrid, designed purely for function
keyElements: GEOMETRIC shapes - cubes, hexagons, octagons - NO organic curves
Dark metal with exposed circuitry and conduits
GREEN glow from power systems and regeneration alcoves
NO windows - Borg do not need to see outside
NO aesthetic design - pure brutal function
Drones moving through corridors like insects in a hive
Technology assimilated from countless species visible
Central processing nodes for Collective coordination
NO individuality, NO decoration, NO color except functional green
architectureStyle.colors: Black metal, dark gray, gunmetal, GREEN accent lighting/glow only
architectureStyle.materials: Assimilated metal alloys, organic-tech hybrid materials, neural interface conduits

buildings.name: Central Plexus
buildings.description: Primary Collective coordination hub. Massive processing core, millions of data streams, Queen's chamber if present.

buildings.name: Assimilation Chamber
buildings.description: Where new drones are created. Surgical tables, injection tubules, drone storage alcoves.

buildings.name: Regeneration Complex
buildings.description: Thousands of alcoves where drones regenerate. Eerie rows of standing drones, green glow.

buildings.name: Maturation Chamber
buildings.description: Where assimilated children are rapidly aged. Accelerated growth pods, horrifying efficiency.

buildings.name: Vinculum Node
buildings.description: Processes and distributes Collective consciousness. Neural transceiver arrays, data routing.

buildings.name: Technology Processing
buildings.description: Analyzes and integrates assimilated technology. Constant adaptation and improvement.

buildings.name: Nanoprobe Fabrication
buildings.description: Manufactures nanoprobes for assimilation. Microscopic assembly lines, raw material processing.

buildings.name: Drone Assembly
buildings.description: Constructs mechanical components for drones. Cybernetic limbs, ocular implants, armor plating.

buildings.name: Power Distribution Hub
buildings.description: Manages energy from transwarp conduits and singularity cores. Critical infrastructure.

buildings.name: Transwarp Gate Control
buildings.description: Manages transwarp conduit network access. Coordinates fleet movements across the galaxy.

buildings.name: Subspace Transceiver Array
buildings.description: Long-range communication with Collective. Maintains hive mind across vast distances.

buildings.name: Vessel Construction
buildings.description: Where cubes and spheres are built. Massive industrial complex, geometric precision.

buildings.name: Resource Processing
buildings.description: Extracts and refines raw materials. Strips planets efficiently, no waste.

buildings.name: Tactical Analysis Node
buildings.description: Studies enemy weaknesses. Adaptation algorithms developed here.

buildings.name: Species Database
buildings.description: Archives information on all encountered species. Biological and technological data.

buildings.name: Temporal Research
buildings.description: Studies time travel technology. The Borg seek perfection across all timelines.

buildings.name: Unicomplex Fragment
buildings.description: Section of massive Borg central hub. Where the Queen coordinates operations.

buildings.name: Drone Storage
buildings.description: Deactivated drones stored for future use. Thousands in stasis, ready for activation.

buildings.name: Shield Generator
buildings.description: Adaptive shielding for ground installations. Frequency modulation, regeneration.

buildings.name: Weapons Platform
buildings.description: Ground-based defense. Cutting beams, torpedo launchers, adaptive targeting.

buildings.name: Neural Interface Hub
buildings.description: Where drones connect to local Collective network. Mind synchronization point.

buildings.name: Biological Processing
buildings.description: Handles organic components of assimilation. Species-specific adaptations.

buildings.name: Debris Reclamation
buildings.description: Processes destroyed ships and structures. Nothing is wasted, all is assimilated.

buildings.name: Expansion Coordinator
buildings.description: Plans assimilation of new territories. Target prioritization, resource allocation.
